<SectionDefinition>

## Functions

### makeVisible() {#aecd7db67c15393462f7d55af64644142}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static void makeVisible (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/globalvalue">GlobalValue</a> &amp; GV, bool Delete)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Make sure GV is visible from both modules.

Delete is true if it is being deleted from this module. This also makes sure GV cannot be dropped so that references from the split module remain valid.

Definition at line <a href="#l00023">23</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/ipo/extractgv-cpp">ExtractGV.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>
